title: Lynx Venture into League of Legends. Our search for a team begins for the upcoming OOL split
body:
Lynx are looking to venture into league of legends. We are a new organisation that missed the deadline in accordance to buying an OCS spot.
We believe that we are still capable of acquiring a slot through OOL hence why we are openly announcing our search.

Below are the **benefits** we are providing in the form of incentives if you **promote into OCS**. 
Player - $800 **per** player ($100 for making **promotion match** + $700 upon promoting to **OCS**)
Manager - $200 
Coach - $500

There is also an additional incentive we are running to make our life easier:
If you approach us with a pre built roster and this roster makes OCS. We will give the approaching individual additional $200 upon promotion.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/lynx_gg)
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/lynxg/)
[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0wcZ7p-FfrN7rSL1nRWlvQ)
[Website](http://lynx.gg/)

Please fill out the application form below : The application will also act as a way to judge your suitability based on your answers.
[Applications Form](https://goo.gl/forms/bmAwcmkiV0siybP32)
Remember that this will be done under a **contractual obligation**. We may also be looking for a head of LoL department so fill an application out and use the email at the end to get into contact with us.

replies.body: I have applied, how would I be able to contact you?
We will review your application and if we like what we see then we will be in touch.
Ah, so you could say joining is only 20% within our control.
Hello, unfortunately after looking at your account you do not meet our cutoff rank. Thank you for taking the time to apply and I wish you the best of luck in finding a team.

Such a wasted opportunity.

Honestly why not trial every player that asks so you can personally judge for yourself how good they are? By restricting yourself to diamond 2+, you are literally ignoring 99.74% of potential players who just might be good enough to play in this team you are trying to make, and those players you find who are better might be the difference between making OCS or not. That is real money that can give players the incentive to become better and get a taste at playing professionally. Worst case scenario you end up choosing those players of diamond 2+ because you think they are better and everyone else gets experience at playing with players of higher rank.

A good example I can give would be Blacktown city demons in NSW Premier league, who are semi professional and their 1st grade team get paid to play. When they hold trials, they are completely open trials, anyone who wants a trial regardless of their prior experience gets to have a go. The last time I checked, they were strong contenders for top 4 finshes in their leagues.
Lmao dude chill your gold 4, focus more on soloq and being more active

I have no reason to be active right now, I am waiting for a specific player in my team to get his PC sorted before we get back into flex and solo queue is a roll the dice every game so there is no point playing it. It is hard enough relying on other players that I am familiar with but cannot control, let alone 3-4 randoms doing their own thing. unknowingly destroying their own chances of winning as well as mine.
Mate get a higher rank and people will take you more seriously. It's that simple.

I would get a higher rank if it was in my control to do so.

How about we all just realise how the system works and that it can't be used to judge anyones ability.

That would fix all the problems, then low elo players wouldnt have confidence issues and then trials would always be open and you can then see who is ACTUALLY superior instead of not even giving them the chance to prove otherwise.
You can't blame this game on luck if after 5000+ games of league you haven't changed in elo

First of all its 6000+ and because of the number of games I have had I can assure you that I can blame it on luck, because in those 6000+ games I have never been given any reason to believe anything else.

Yep so you are looking for rank not ability, gotcha.

Well good luck with the team.
Also, I want to be trialed with a particular duo partner.

Dude, You're a joke to the community. Everyone knows you, I've been on  a team with you; I've went from p5 to d5 in a week and i'm proud to say you can carry a game easily if you just follow whats op or even just take the time to learn meta or master a champ. First of all man you're a joke as I said, No one takes you seriously, The reason why its d2+ is because anyone who's decent is d2+ and everything under including me is trash. You're just making yourself look like a jester in a court of men just trying to get through the Halls of Justice and work there way up. Learn your place White Pumah or god help me you'll stay in Gold elo forever.

Now you as well?

Why are people so easily corrupted by greed?

If I got to challenger I can almost guarantee that I would have the exact same mindset as I do right now. yet everyone keeps being converted to the "if I am good I will climb" mentality when they climb. Probably because they so badly want to believe that the rank they are gaining or have gained is achieved only by them playing well and not by the luck of the RNG.

Once again humanities biggest downfall is emotion over logic. The act of disregarding logic because it doesn't agree with them.

In my opinion gaming is about improving and challenging yourself in an enjoyable environment. The win/loss ranking system that was solely designed for 1v1 being used in a 5v5 has negated the representation of comparative progression. So because players cant see any indication of their own progression besides win/loss, false readings start to mislead their development and then you have people building statik shiv and last whisper and thinking its a great combo. So you end up with all this sub optimal strategy taking place and if anyone dare strays from that path, they get flamed and their teammates decide that they should lose the game on purpose to teach them a lesson and intentionally feed the game away.

How much simpler would this all be if your performance is what gave you or took away LP and MMR. I have already given an untested theoretical solution as well which Riot have already got the foundations for. Then their pretty much won't be an excuse, better players will be practically guaranteed to climb and then you would start to see how truly amazing players and teams can become. There is a reason I watch starcraft 2 professional games and not professional league of legends games, cause relatively what I expect from pro players in starcraft 2 is what they deliver and the same cannot be said for league of legends.

You talk as if you're speaking logically, You're speaking from anger because you're angry at riots system and you want to completely dis-regard a theorem that works. Logically if you're good you'll rank up.  Emotionally you'll complain about not ranking up because of "shit teammates" yea there are bad teammates but there are also good ones. You're a hypocrite and a fucking disgrace. If you love star craft 2 so much and think its better, Quit league and uninstall it then. The League community has no time for you anymore, You're a joke to everyone from bronze to challenger. 

Go back inside your own mind, Its where you fit the best.

So many points I could make to argue against that, and yet it won't matter because you ignore reality. Claiming that I am the one doing so without having any sort of counter to the logic of my reasoning just means nothing to me. You are just claiming something based on belief and nothing else. Show me some maths that overrides my own apparently inferior and basic mathematical evidence.

Mathematics can be incomplete, but never misinterpreted, so please use it.

My reason is that each player is only 20% of his team, therefore his rank is only 20% his own. What is your counter to this that supposedly negates that statement?
My counter is that you play hyper carries like Twitch, Trist and Draven if you want to carry your team and be more than 20%

You can't be more than 1/5 players on your team.

On top of that I have the best stats in the world for adc using twitch both last season and this season.

Try again.

https://gyazo.com/e51f9df358f0d7a220478405f07e0292

Excuse me?

You don't have the best stats mate, Stop kidding yourself and making yourself to be good.

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/summoners/twitch

There is no website that ranks based on stats...

You have to actually compare the stats yourself.

[http://imgur.com/a/lprnv](http://imgur.com/a/lprnv)

[http://www.lolskill.net/top/most-games/page-3?filterChampion=29&filterRealm=](http://www.lolskill.net/top/most-games/page-3?filterChampion=29&filterRealm=)

Find me someone with better stats over 50 games.

Try again.

Nice 62 mr "Best in the world" also that's champion enthusiasts

https://gyazo.com/7bcfa35cfa771225bace000ceee48a6c

Try again.  That's for people who are dedicated to the champ, Doesn't mean you're good at the champ.

I told you it doesn't rank you based off stats, you have to compare them with anyone you can find.

Try again

> [{quoted}](name=Gnarmy of One,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=LVUoKnhK,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-05T00:27:39.653+0000)
>
> You talk as if you're speaking logically, You're speaking from anger
I'll leave it at this, You know what they say "You can't argue with stupid people"

We are still taking applicants due to dropouts and no acceptance on ads. Roles include
Top
Jungle
Support
There is also only one submission for jungle. All other roles we now have an influx of. If you are a jungler and have previously capped high diamond to challenger we are interested in you.
There are no submission for support thus far. If you are a support and of Diamond tier or above we would be interested.
We are letting the application run its course for another couple of days. We will be contacting personal starting this weekend.
Is that $800 per player?
yes per player
